name: tableRowCountToBeBetween
displayName: Table Row Count To Be Between
description: This defines the test TableRowCountToBeBetween. Test the number of rows to between to two values.

parameterDefinition.name: minValue
parameterDefinition.description: Expected number of columns should be greater than or equal to {minValue}. If minValue is not included, maxValue is treated as upperBound and there will be no minimum

parameterDefinition.name: maxValue
parameterDefinition.description: Expected number of columns should be less than or equal to {maxValue}. If maxValue is not included, minValue is treated as lowerBound and there will be no maximum
